items.hide_mr: Hide items unavailable with my Mastery Rank

descriptions.Arbitration: Traded with Arbitration resources in Arbiters of Hexis.
descriptions.Automatically acquired: Automatically acquired when picking up a specific item, like sentinels.
descriptions.Baro Ki'Teer: Item potentially sold by Baro Ki'Teer in relay, every Friday.
descriptions.Boss Drop: Blueprint or weapon parts dropped from Bosses mission, or Boss invasion (Stalker, Grustrag or Zanuka).
descriptions.Bounty: Exclusive items in Bounty quests in Cetus, Fortuna, Necralisk among many others.
descriptions.Coda / Eleanor: Special Technocyte Coda weapons, purchased from Eleanor in Höllvania.
descriptions.Dojo: Items with Dojo acquisition will be in some laboratory to purchase the item blueprint, you need to be in a Clan to enter Dojo.
descriptions.Duviri: Acquired from Teshin's Cave, Acrithis NPC or from Enigmas by Duviri World.
descriptions.Ergo Glast: Purchased from Ergo Glast with Corrupted Holokey, obtained from Void Storm in Railjack missions or defeating a Sister of Parvos.
descriptions.Founder Exclusive: Exclusive Founders Packages items, no longer obtainable for purchase.
descriptions.Höllvania: Exclusive drop in Höllvania mission types.
descriptions.Incubator: Incube a egg on Orbit, pray for RNG.
descriptions.Kahl's Garrison: Purchased in Kahl's Garrison item shop, in Drifter's Camp.
descriptions.Kuva Lich: Exclusive drop from Kuva Lich enemies.
descriptions.Market: The blueprint of items with Market acquisition can be purchased directly from the in-game store.
descriptions.Nightwave: Items purchased on Nightwave shop, using nightwave credits.
descriptions.Proxima Star Chart: Blueprint or item parts dropped in Railjack missions.
descriptions.Quest: Quests are a set of interlinked missions that occasionally provide lore, quest acquisition items will be given as a reward for completion.
descriptions.Relic Drop: Prime versions will 99% of the time they are dropped from Relics.
descriptions.Revivification: Special mechanic from Son, in Necralisk.
descriptions.Sisters of Parvos: Exclusive drop from Sisters of Parvos.
descriptions.Standing: Purchased with Standing in Cetus, Fortuna, Necralisk among many others.
descriptions.Star Chart: Blueprint or item parts dropped in common missions or Star Chart.
